title: Best of The Herd: 09/09/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/09/2019
description:
Colin compares the Browns to the dumb guy who lectures everyone else about success yet has none of their own.  He doesn't think Antonio brown is a risk at all for the Patriots.  Colin explains where he was right and wrong over the weekend and there was a lot of both.  Plus, former Pro Bowl QB Michael Vick comes in studio to talk about Baker Mayfield's struggles and what he liked from Kyler Murray in his first start. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
